resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

lidavidm commented on a change in pull request #12713:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12713#discussion_r835558081



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/python/gdb.cc
##########
@@ -29,6 +29,7 @@
 #include "arrow/scalar.h"
 #include "arrow/table.h"
 #include "arrow/type.h"
+#include "arrow/testing/gtest_util.h"

Review comment:
       I'm not sure we want this linked to googletest, we should stick to the old version. 




--

lidavidm commented on a change in pull request #12713:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12713#discussion_r836407569



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/python/gdb.h
##########
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ namespace arrow {
 namespace gdb {
 
 ARROW_PYTHON_EXPORT
-void TestSession();
+Status TestSession();

Review comment:
       We need to update the binding signature on the Cython side.
